WarnerMedia Entertainment Inc. seeks a Sr. Data Scientist for the Emerging & Creative Technologies team. The Data Scientist will be responsible for developing and maintaining machine learning algorithms which correlate neurological states with audio visual content for a consumer facing ML based Neurotechnology platform. This position will be responsible for the integrity and effectiveness of the ML algorithms and databases that power these platforms. This position also assists with AI/ML research and development in real-time interactive Mixed Reality applications, utilizing Computer Vision, Speech, Natural Language Processing, AI-based cognitive framework, and physic-based motion simulations.
